'See you in hell.. for the sequel'
dope track, loved it from the start, couldn't even anticipate the new EP, got me surprised
"See you in hell... for the sequel..." ... I like how they use it 11 years later for the EP-title.
So good. Can't wait for the new Bad Meets Evil EP: http://lostinthesound.com/news/619-eminem-announces-bad-meets-evil-ep-title-hell-the-sequel.html
I'm bad enough to commit suicide and survive long enough to kill my soul after I'm dead <- EPIC
Royce stays toe to toe with Eminem on this song
Masterpiece

I used to be a loudmouth, remember me? (nuh-uh) I'm the one who burned your house down (oh) Well I'm out now (shit), and this time I'm comin back to blow your house up and I ain't going leave you a window to jump out of

the mint sound of their voices on this tune, along with that fuzz bass gels so well. all hail Mike Elizondo and Dre!
Genius.
Eminem - Bad Meets Evil
These two really need to do another track together

"we ain't eager to be legal. so please leave me with the keys to your Jeep Eagle. I breathe ether in 3 lethal amounts, while I stab myself in the knee, with a diseased needle!" Goddamn. Eminem is the master of the assonance rhyme scheme, bar none.
I'm not a real person, I'm a ghost trapped in a beat
He's evil, and I'm bad like Steve Seagal. This was Em at his best.
Gotta love the Clint Eastwood themed intro...
